channel.title: RSPS AutoBuyer

item.title: RSPS AutoBuyer
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:370861”]I’ve actually made a few scripts for rsps’s (more for like woodcutting or w/e)
The one thing that sucks is that most RSPS’s have different types of banking or w/e, so you need to edit it for each different server.

I wouldn’t worry about detectability, I’d worry about randoms. I added a basic random event to davidscape to stop this type of script ;)[/quote]

Yeah, this wouldn’ t work on a 508 like yours without some major modifications. It can be done though.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS AutoBuyer
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’ve actually made a few scripts for rsps’s (more for like woodcutting or w/e)
The one thing that sucks is that most RSPS’s have different types of banking or w/e, so you need to edit it for each different server.

I wouldn’t worry about detectability, I’d worry about randoms. I added a basic random event to davidscape to stop this type of script

item.title: RSPS AutoBuyer
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:3, topic:370861”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=466953.msg3414609#msg3414609 date=1290958821]
It’s pretty simple, but there is nothing wrong with that. If you were playing on regular runescape, no random in your wait and MoveMouse would be detectable, but I don’t know any RSPS that checks for autoing, so you should be good.
[/quote]

Thanks, and this script is useless on Runescape because of the “buy x” option I am gonna add more random timers in my future scripts and use different methods of mouse movement and clicking, so that should make it less detectable.[/quote]
sif anyone has added macro detection to their rsps…

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS AutoBuyer
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It’s pretty simple, but there is nothing wrong with that. If you were playing on regular runescape, no random in your wait and MoveMouse would be detectable, but I don’t know any RSPS that checks for autoing, so you should be good.

Thanks, and this script is useless on Runescape because of the “buy x” option I am gonna add more random timers in my future scripts and use different methods of mouse movement and clicking, so that should make it less detectable.

item.title: RSPS AutoBuyer
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

This is my first Simba Script, recently moved on from SCAR. The script is pretty self explanatory, you decide on an item you want to buy, find a color on its icon that is unique in the shop, and add it to the variable “ItemColor”. Currently the item is set to buy Water Runes.

[code= pascal]//Simba Autobuyer Script
//Author: Sanskrit
program AutoBuyer;

var
x,y: Integer;
Bmp: Integer;

const
ItemColor= 9440264;

procedure LoadBmps;
begin
Bmp := BitmapFromString(15, 7, ‘meJxzD4l1D4n9DwYMDAzuqFwgiUc’ +
‘WUzGEJKgYYizxiiEi+BWjuQTCgLORAZp6uEqIIAMGgKtHEwEA9Cah’ +
‘cA==’);
end;

procedure RightClickItem;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,ItemColor,27,24,501,320)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y+random(3));
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x,y,mouse_Right);
Wait(100);
end;
end;

procedure LeftClickItem;
begin
if(FindBitmap(Bmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y+random(3));
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x,y,mouse_Left);
end;
end;

procedure FreeBmps;
begin
FreeBitmap(Bmp);
end;

begin
repeat
LoadBmps;
RightClickItem;
LeftClickItem;
FreeBmps;
until(false);
end.[/code]

Bitmap:

Video of the script in action:

Anything I can improve on?

Read full topic
